00033 namespace OgreOggSound
00034 {
00036 
00043         template <class Type>
00044         class LocklessQueue
00045         {
00046         private:
00048                 Type* m_buffer;
00049 
00051                 size_t m_head;
00052 
00054                 size_t m_tail;
00055 
00057                 size_t m_size;
00058 
00059         public:
00061                 inline LocklessQueue(size_t size) :
00062                 m_head(0), m_tail(0), m_size(size + 1)
00063                 {
00064                         m_buffer = new Type[m_size];
00065                 }
00066 
00068                 inline ~LocklessQueue()
00069                 {
00070                         delete [] m_buffer;
00071                 }
00072 
00074                 inline bool push(const Type& obj)
00075                 {
00076                         size_t next_head = (m_head + 1) % m_size;
00077                         if (next_head == m_tail) return false;
00078                         m_buffer[m_head] = obj;
00079                         m_head = next_head;
00080                         return true;
00081                 }
00082 
00084 
00088                 inline bool empty() const
00089                 {
00090                         return (m_head==m_tail);
00091                 }
00092 
00094                 inline bool pop(Type& obj)
00095                 {
00096                         if (m_tail == m_head) return false;
00097                         obj = m_buffer[m_tail];
00098                         m_tail = (m_tail + 1) % m_size;
00099                         return true;
00100                 }
00101         };
00102 };
